name: Citron Tea Mojito
description: To make alcohol-free Mojitos, replace white rum with additional lime juice or Tea.
preparation: Juice lime with a 2-in-1 Citrus Press. Place mint in tall highball glass. Cover with sugar and lime juice. With the back of a spoon, lightly crush mint.
Fill glass half-full with ice. Add rum, Sencha & Jasmine Green Tea Blend, and fill with club soda and stir well. Garnish with lime wedge and sprig of fresh mint. Serve.
tips: Infuse your Mojito with fresh berries or cucumber for a delightful twist!
